title: Creates a scratch off lottery ticket with an arts theme; proceeds from such lottery ticket shall be made available for the support of elementary and secondary arts education
summary: Requires the division of lottery to produce a scratch off lottery ticket with an arts theme; proceeds from such lottery ticket shall be made available for the support of elementary and secondary art education curriculums.

       AN  ACT  to  amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to
         creating arts themed  lottery  tickets  with  the  proceeds  given  to
         elementary and secondary arts education curriculums

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The tax law is amended by adding a new section 1621 to read
    2  as follows:
    3    S 1621. ARTS EDUCATION LOTTERY TICKETS.    NOTWITHSTANDING  ANY  OTHER
    4  PROVISION  OF LAW TO THE CONTRARY, THE DIVISION OF LOTTERY SHALL PRODUCE
    5  A SCRATCH OFF LOTTERY TICKET WITH AN ARTS THEME, THE PROCEEDS  OF  WHICH
    6  SHALL BE MADE AVAILABLE FOR THE SUPPORT OF ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY ARTS
    7  EDUCATION  CURRICULUMS.  THE  NET PROCEEDS FROM THE SALE OF SUCH TICKETS
    8  SHALL BE DEPOSITED INTO THE ARTS EDUCATION ACCOUNT ESTABLISHED  PURSUANT
    9  TO SUBDIVISION TWO OF SECTION NINETY-TWO-C OF THE STATE FINANCE LAW.
   10    S  2.  Subdivision  2  of  section  92-c  of the state finance law, as
   11  amended by chapter 913 of the laws  of  1977,  is  amended  to  read  as
   12  follows:
   13    2.  Such  fund  shall  consist of the state lottery revenues including
   14  those revenues derived from lottery tickets  sold  for  the  support  of
   15  winter  sports  physical  education in commemoration of the XIII olympic
   16  winter games, AS WELL AS THOSE REVENUES  DERIVED  FROM  LOTTERY  TICKETS
   17  SOLD  FOR THE SUPPORT OF ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY ARTS EDUCATION CURRIC-
   18  ULUMS, if any, paid into the same by the  division  of  the  lottery  as
   19  provided in section sixteen hundred twelve of the New York state lottery
   20  for  education law, and all other moneys credited or transferred thereto
   21  from any other fund or sources pursuant to law. There  shall  be  estab-
   22  lished  within  such  fund  an  account to be known as the winter sports
